pages.text: A Vault Tool can be $(l)enhanced$() with Jewels in an $(l)Anvil$().$(br2)If the $(l)capacity$() of the Vault Tool is $(l)higher$() than the $(l)size$() of the Jewel, it $(l)can$() be applied. This $(l)lowers$() the $(l)capacity$() by the Jewel's size.$(br2)The $(l)level requirement$() for the Vault Tool $(l)raises$() if a Jewel is applied to it that has a $(l)higher$() level than that of the Vault Tool.

pages.title: Advanced Types
pages.text: Aside from overall improvements, $(l:vault_tools/variants#base_types)$(t:Base Types)$(l)base types$() can be applied to a Vault Tool, changing the $(l)appearance$() of the Vault Tool.$(br2)This grants the Vault Tool the $(l)functionality$() of $(l)all base type$() modifiers applied to it.$(br2)There are a total of $(l)18$() different $(l)advanced$() types.
